data.name: AfterError
data.comment: Error message for date/time validation when a value must occur after another. Parameters: {0} = field name, {1} = comparison field name

data.name: LengthError
data.comment: Error message for length validation when a value exceeds maximum length. Parameters: {0} = field name, {1} = max length

data.name: RequiredError
data.comment: Error message for required field validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: StartDateGreaterError
data.comment: Error message for date range validation when start date must precede end date

data.name: RangeError
data.comment: Error message for range validation. Parameters: {0} = field name, {1} = min value, {2} = max value

data.name: MinLengthError
data.comment: Error message for minimum length validation. Parameters: {0} = field name, {1} = min length

data.name: MaxLengthError
data.comment: Error message for maximum length validation. Parameters: {0} = field name, {1} = max length

data.name: AlphabetAndSpecialCharError
data.value: {0} must contain only alphabets (1st Uppercase) and ,.'()
data.comment: Error message for alphabetic and special character validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: AlphaNumericError
data.value: {0} must contain only alphanumeric characters (1st uppercase)
data.comment: Error message for alphanumeric validation with first character uppercase. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: CapitalAlphabetError
data.comment: Error message for uppercase letter validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: OnlyDigitError
data.comment: Error message for whole number validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: OnlyNumberError
data.comment: Error message for numeric validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: AlphaNumCodeWithHyphenRegExError
data.value: {0} must contain only capital letters, digits and hyphen
data.comment: Error message for alphanumeric code with hyphen validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: FormatError
data.comment: Error message for general format validation. Parameters: {0} = field name

data.name: DuplicateError
data.comment: Error message for duplicate value validation

data.name: ResourceNotFound
data.value: The requested resource was not found
data.comment: Default message for NotFoundException

data.name: EntityNotFound
data.comment: Message for NotFoundException with entity details. Parameters: {0} = entity name, {1} = key

data.name: EntityAlreadyExists
data.comment: Message for AlreadyExistsException. Parameters: {0} = entity name, {1} = key

data.name: ConcurrencyConflict
data.value: A concurrency conflict occurred for entity "{0}" ({1}).
data.comment: Message for ConcurrencyException. Parameters: {0} = entity name, {1} = key

data.name: ValidationFailed
data.value: One or more validation failures have occurred.
data.comment: Default message for ModelValidationException

data.name: UnauthorizedAccess
data.value: You are not authorized to access this resource.
data.comment: Default message for UnauthorizedException

data.name: ForbiddenAccess
data.value: You do not have permission to perform this action.
data.comment: Default message for ForbiddenException

data.name: InternalServerError
data.value: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
data.comment: Default message for InternalServerException

data.name: BadRequest
data.value: The request was invalid or cannot be processed.
data.comment: Default message for BadRequestException

data.name: ConflictError
data.comment: Message for ConflictException. Parameters: {0} = resource name, {1} = reason
